extendedInfo.description: Remote Employee Tracking(RET) application is for tracking records of employee's of small organization.RET is password protected application , without successful login user can not access application. it maintains hierarchy of suprior user(parent user) - sub user(child user). sub user can request to parent user for join to hierarchy, but parent user may approved or unapproved to user. parent user can access all the information of the child user.parent user can change (password, profile, rights) of sub user , but not a vise varsa. All the Users Can View All Assign Task , Completed Task ,Canceled Task . it shows user's current location when any task is completed. Features :-	Remotely Tracking employeeâs records.	Application is password protected.	Application maintains hierarchy (parents - child).	Each user has maintains own unique IDs.	Applications also available in web module. 	User can show location at time of completion task.	Superior can see their all subordinates.	Superior can change subordinateâs (password, profiles, rights etcâ¦ ).	Parents user also access detail of its subuser.	No advertisement.	Light weight Application.
